summary: The Milanese nudist professor Paolo Barca moved to the province of Catania; there he will succeed in changing something both in the school and in his character.
cast: Renato Pozzetto|Janet Agren|Stefano Satta Flores|Paola Borboni|Liana Trouche|Miranda Martino|Valeria Fabrizi|Pinuccio Ardia|Annabella Incontrera|Gennaro Ombra|Margherita Sala|Magali NoÃ«l|Florence Barnes|Giuseppe Marrocco|Enzo Mondino|Gennarino Pappagalli|Valentino Simeoni
title: Asignatura casi prohibida
